subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The perennial Tour de France contender Andy Schleck pulled out of this year’s race because of a spine injury he sustained during the Critérium du Dauphiné last week.
snippet: The perennial Tour de France contender Andy Schleck pulled out of this year’s race because of a spine injury he sustained during the Critérium du Dauphiné last week.
